law.text: The commissioner may promulgate reasonable rules and regulations not inconsistent with the provisions of this subtitle that the commissioner deems necessary for the proper administration of this subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1423, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 437, sec. 22, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 32, sec. 25, effective June 18, 1970.
